```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)

# Load data

fileNames <- Sys.glob("data/*/*/*.csv")
df <- data.frame()
for (file in fileNames) {
  temp <- read_csv(file, col_names = TRUE)
  temp$filename <- file
  temp$time <- row.names(temp)
  df <- rbind(df, temp)
}
```

```{r}
# Extract parameter values into their own columns
df <- df %>% rowwise() %>% mutate(r=str_split(filename, "/")[[1]][2], seed=unlist(str_split(filename, "/"))[3])

# Plot data
ggplot(data=df) + stat_summary(aes(y=A, x=Time, color=r, fill=r), fun.data="mean_cl_boot", geom="smooth", se=TRUE) + theme_classic()
```
